mapper.select:
select
from inbound_product a left join inbound b on b.inbound_oder_code = a.inbound_oder_code left join purchase_order_product c on a.linenum = c.linnum and b.source_oder_code = c.purchase_order_code where a.inbound_oder_code = #{inboundOderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
